data.fullContent: Authors struggled intensely to write poetry. `` The Hartford Wits, '' Dwight, Barlow, and Trumbull, wrote a vast quantity of verse. The most of this is artificial, and reveals the influence of the classical school of Alexander Pope. Freneau wrote a few short lyrics which suggest the romantic school of Wordsworth.
data.answer: 作家们拼命地写诗。德怀特、巴洛和特朗布尔写了大量的诗歌。其中大部分是人为的，并揭示了亚历山大教皇的古典学派的影响。弗瑞诺写了几句简短的歌词，暗示了华兹华斯的浪漫主义风格。
